__e: He's a glorified accountant and he's after you.
He's a bookeeper and will always be one.
And then the two accountants came out, and went on and on and on about all the rules.

I follow. But, you see, the snag is... if I now call the service and say to them... "I've got a 45-year-old accountant who wants to become a lion tamer"... their first question is not going to be "Does he have his own hat?"
- Chernov? That bookkeeper who nearly ruined you 12 years ago in the forgery affair... Would you recognize his walk today?
You know what, why don't you find yourself an accountant that don't mind bending the rules and let him take care of it for you?
